<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3351</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Whatif Kids liked Poetry: Shel Silverstein in the Classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Whatif Zicklein mochten Poesie: Shel 
Silverstein im Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les gosses de Whatif ont aimé la poésie : 
Shel Silverstein dans la salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os miúdos de Whatif gostaram da poesia: 
Shel Silverstein na sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I capretti di Whatif hanno gradito la poesia: 
Shel Silverstein nell'aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρεστή κατσίκια ποίηση Whatif: Shel 
Silverstein στην τάξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los cabritos de Whatif tuvieron gusto de poesía: 
Shel Silverstein en la sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this article,which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, the writer presents and discusses the many reasons to use poetry by Shel Silverstein in the EFL classroom</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Artikel der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erscheint, stellt der Verfasser und behandelt die vielen Gründe dar, 
Poesie durch Shel Silverstein im EFL Klassenzimmer zu verwenden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En cet article, qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de 
magazine d'ETNI, l'auteur présente et discute les nombreuses raisons 
d'utiliser la poésie par Shel Silverstein dans la salle de classe 
d'EFL</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste artigo, que se publica no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, o escritor apresenta e discute muitas razões 
usar a poesia por Shel Silverstein na sala de aula de EFL</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo articolo, che è publicato nel PANNO 
dello scomparto di ETNI, il produttore presenta e discute i molti 
motivi usare la poesia da Shel Silverstein nell'aula di EFL</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το άρθρο, που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ 
περιοδικών ETNI, ο συγγραφέας παρουσιάζει και συζητά τους 
πολλούς λόγους να χρησιμοποιήσει την ποίηση από Shel 
Silverstein στην τάξη EFL</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este artículo, que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, el programa de escritura presenta y discute 
las muchas razones de utilizar poesía de Shel Silverstein en la sala 
de clase de EFL</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">poesía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
